entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Trenton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 1:00 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: NW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
